title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1373/92 of 21 May 1992 fixing the target price for milk and the intervention prices for butter, skimmed-milk powder and Grana Padano and Parmigiano Reggiano cheeses for the 1992/93 milk year
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1373/92 of 21 May 1992 fixing the target price for milk and the intervention prices for butter, skimmed-milk powder and Grana Padano and Parmigiano Reggiano cheeses for the 1992/93 milk year
THE COUNCIL OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1992/93 milk year, the target price for milk and the intervention prices for milk products shall be as follows:
(in ECU/100 kg)
Community
except Portugal
Portugal
a)
target price for milk:
26,81
26,81
b)
intervention price:
butter
292,78
292,78
skimmed-milk powder manufactured using the:
- spray method
- roller method
172,43
163,81 (ยน)
207,00
-
Grana Padano cheese:
- between 30 and 60 days old
- at least 6 months old
379,67
470,43
Parmigiano Reggiano cheese at least 6 months old
519,21
(ยน) For skimmed-milk powder manufactured in the territory of the former German Democratic Republic only.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from the 1992/93 milk year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 May 1992.
For the Council
The President
Arlindo MARQUES CUNHA
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 374/92 (OJ No L 41, 18. 2. 1992, p. 9).(2) OJ No C 119, 11. 5. 1992, p. 45.(3) Opinion delivered on 14 May 1992 (not yet published in the Official  Journal).(4) Opinion delivered on 29 April 1992 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
